posts.postText:
I have this class called Digital Art that I take at school because I need at least 1 art credit to graduate. I made this the other day when i was bored on Corel Painter.
 http://i877.photobucket.com/albums/ab332/Destar_01/Untitled-1.png 
I thought it was pretty cool.

>> 
I thought it was pretty cool. I agree.
